page.title: 03THE CHINA CLAY INDUSTRY PT2
page.content: The process of removing the China Clay from the ground is one of open-cast mining.Deposits of kaolin are usually funnel- shaped with the widest part near the surface.Within the area the Clay Pits of{Dorothy and Littlejohns are two open-cast mining operations that are being combined to form the largest working in the St. Austell region. Together, they cover 325 acres and the combined output each week is approx. 14,000 tonnes of clay.(10,000 tonnes from Littlejohns and 4,000 tonnes from Dorothy). According to the China Clay Company working the area, this reserve is most important and has the highest quality clay used in the Paper Industry as a filler and coating grade.Other applications include the Paint,Rubber, Plastics and Pharmaceutical Industries
